name: DESERTFETCHER
description:
In DESERTFETCHER, you play as Grög, with the amazing ability of walking left and right (you don't need nothing else) in order to transport the luggage and belongings of the King, who's moving out of his castle.

To win, you must get a total of 70 points, can you win the challenge?

(This game saves your progress in your browser cache, clearing it will make you start from scratch!1!)
